thread.title: Eden Hazard treats himself: Chelsea fans will be pleased for this reason
thread.title_full: Eden Hazard treats himself: Chelsea fans will be pleased for this reason

title: Eden Hazard treats himself: Chelsea fans will be pleased for this reason
text:
Eden Hazard treats himself: Chelsea fans will be pleased for this reason EDEN HAZARD has been in terrific form for Chelsea this season. PUBLISHED: 05:00, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 | UPDATED: 05:00, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 
Eden Hazard 's 10 goals this term have fired Chelsea to an eight-point lead at the top of the Premier League table with 13 games remaining. 
And the diminutive playmaker treated himself yesterday by visiting Fulham Tattoo Centre. 
During his four-hour session, the Belgian was inked with a half-sleeve tattoo. A post shared by Fulham Tattoo Centre (@fulhamtattoocentre) on Feb 22, 2017 at 10:17am PST GETTY Eden Hazard spent four hours getting a tattoo done Chelsea's main man popped in today @hazardeden_10 for a 4 hour session Fulham Tattoo Centre's Instagram post 
The Centre posted a picture on Instagram of Hazard’s new body work, and they claim he’s staying put at Chelsea which will be great news for the fans. 
A caption read: “Chelsea's main man popped in today @hazardeden_10 for a 4 hour session. 
“First of many. Started a half sleeve. Chelsea's FA Cup player ratings against Wolves Sat, February 18, 2017
